main.name: Pham Ngoc Khoi

main.bio: I'm Pham Ngoc Khoi and i'm a Fresher Developer. I'm eager to be challenged in order to grow and further improve my IT skills. My greatest passion is in life is using my technical know-how to benefit other people and organisations.

education.description: At Codegym Vietnam I learned about Javascript language, Java language and some technologies like: Spring MVC, Hibernate,...
At Bachkhoa Aptech I learned about HTML, CSS, PHP language and MySQL database and some technologies like: Bootstrap, Laravel,...

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
